quest.name: Tent That Rocked
journal: Caur needs the help of a strong womanman.
objectives: Obtain a tent pillar from the ruined tent.
Deliver the tent pillar to Caur.

dialogue.name: CAUR
dialogue.text: Could I ask you to help with repairing our tent?

dialogue.name: CAUR
dialogue.text: The central pillar propping it up has been steadily weakening over the recent months and I worry it will not hold out much longer.

dialogue.name: CAUR
dialogue.text: However, the other day I noticed that there is a perfectly good pillar just south of here. You will find it amongst the remains of a Kahkol tent destroyed by the Buduga.

dialogue.name: CAUR
dialogue.text: There is another pillar just south of here. You will find it amongst the remains of a Kahkol tent destroyed by the Buduga.

dialogue.name: CAUR
dialogue.text: Were you able to find the pillar?

dialogue.name: CAUR
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! This should hold for many a year yet.

dialogue.name: CAUR
dialogue.text: We never lack for wool to make tent covers, but finding solid tree trunks to serve as pillars is not quite as straightforward.

dialogue.name: CAUR
dialogue.text: You have truly done us a great service. Thank you.
